It was a short delivery and way down the leg side, Sanga went for the pull, but missed it. It was far from anything other than the bat.. So if the noise is there, it has to come from the bat or the glove. There was definitely a clunky noise as the ball went past the bat. It is given not out and called a wide.. Umar Akmal is shocked
